title: What Time Does Will Trent Season 3 Release on ABC & Hulu?
description: Fans are eagerly awaiting the release date and time of Season 3 of Hulu’s hit series Will Trent, which follows Agent Will Trent, a product of Atlanta’s foster care system, as he works to prevent others from suffering similar hardships. With the new season approaching, viewers are anxious to know the release date, episode count, […] The post What Time Does Will Trent Season 3 Release on ABC & Hulu? appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Ayesha Zafar
excerpt: Discover the release time and all the latest details on Will Trent Season 3. Find out when the premiere is, the episode count, and more.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Fans are eagerly awaiting the release date and time of Season 3 of Hulu’s hit series Will Trent, which follows Agent Will Trent, a product of Atlanta’s foster care system, as he works to prevent others from suffering similar hardships. With the new season approaching, viewers are anxious to know the release date, episode count, and details about the storyline. Without further ado, let’s cover all the latest details, including the release time, on Will Trent Season 3. When does Will Trent Season 3 come out on ABC and Hulu? Will Trent Season 3 is set to premiere on January 7, 2025, at 8 PM ET and 5 PM PT on ABC, with episodes available on Hulu the following day, January 8. Fans can mark their calendars as the highly anticipated season kicks off on a Tuesday evening. This season boasts a total of 18 episodes, doubling the count from Season 2, and promises a deeper dive into its captivating storyline. Episodes will air weekly on Tuesdays, offering fans an extended journey into the world of Will Trent. What is Will Trent Season 3 about? Season 3 begins with Special Agent Will Trent returning to the Georgia Bureau of Investigation after a six-month hiatus following the arrest of his girlfriend, Angie Polaski. Reintegrating into the team proves challenging, particularly with his partner, Faith, who is frustrated by his sudden absence. Meanwhile, Marion, a tough prosecutor, joins Will on a missing person case, adding a new layer of intrigue. Based on Karin Slaughter’s novels and brought to life by Liz Heldens and Daniel T. Thomsen, Will Trent weaves character-driven drama with intense crime procedural elements. The cast includes Ramón Rodríguez, Erika Christensen, Iantha Richardson, Jake McLaughlin, Sonja Sohn, Gina Rodriguez, and others. While waiting for Season 3, viewers can stream Seasons 1 and 2 on ABC and Hulu.
html:
Fans are eagerly awaiting the release date and time of Season 3 of Hulu’s hit series Will Trent, which follows Agent Will Trent, a product of Atlanta’s foster care system, as he works to prevent others from suffering similar hardships. With the new season approaching, viewers are anxious to know the release date, episode count, and details about the storyline.

Without further ado, let’s cover all the latest details, including the release time, on Will Trent Season 3.

When does Will Trent Season 3 come out on ABC and Hulu?

Will Trent Season 3 is set to premiere on January 7, 2025, at 8 PM ET and 5 PM PT on ABC, with episodes available on Hulu the following day, January 8.

Fans can mark their calendars as the highly anticipated season kicks off on a Tuesday evening. This season boasts a total of 18 episodes, doubling the count from Season 2, and promises a deeper dive into its captivating storyline. Episodes will air weekly on Tuesdays, offering fans an extended journey into the world of Will Trent.

What is Will Trent Season 3 about?

Season 3 begins with Special Agent Will Trent returning to the Georgia Bureau of Investigation after a six-month hiatus following the arrest of his girlfriend, Angie Polaski. Reintegrating into the team proves challenging, particularly with his partner, Faith, who is frustrated by his sudden absence. Meanwhile, Marion, a tough prosecutor, joins Will on a missing person case, adding a new layer of intrigue.

Based on Karin Slaughter’s novels and brought to life by Liz Heldens and Daniel T. Thomsen, Will Trent weaves character-driven drama with intense crime procedural elements.

The cast includes Ramón Rodríguez, Erika Christensen, Iantha Richardson, Jake McLaughlin, Sonja Sohn, Gina Rodriguez, and others.

While waiting for Season 3, viewers can stream Seasons 1 and 2 on ABC and Hulu.
